NK016(ma)015:0: dong sprugs phyag rgya gcig pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg snying por dril ba bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)015:2: dong sprugs phyag rgya gcig pa la brten nas zhi
NK016(ma)015:3: ba'i sbyin sreg shin tu bsdus pa'i tshul gyis sgrub
NK016(ma)015:8: zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi snga dro'i char shis pa'i
NK016(ma)015:9: sa las thab stegs gru bzhi pa'i steng du rdul
NK016(ma)015:10: tshon dkar pos thab khung ji ltar 'tshams pa zlum
NK016(ma)015:11: por bskor ba la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad lte bar
NK016(ma)015:12: rdo rje ra yig gis mtshan pa /
NK016(ma)015:13: de rgyab mchu dang kha khyer sor bzhi te bskor
NK016(ma)015:14: bar me ri g.yas bskor du 'bar ba dang rdo
NK016(ma)015:15: rje'i phreng ba / de rgya ba grwa bzhir zla
NK016(ma)015:16: phyed rdo rje re re mgo phyir bstan du bris
NK016(ma)015:17: la me tog dkar po gcal du bkram /
NK016(ma)015:18: 'phral mgyogs lta bur bris thab mi 'grub na thab
NK016(ma)015:19: stegs dkar po zlum po'i dbus su me tog dkar
NK016(ma)015:20: po'i tshom bu gcig bkod pas kyang rung /
NK016(ma)015:21: gang ltar yang der tsher ma med pa'i bud shing skam pos zlum por brtsig la me tshang bca' /
NK016(ma)015:22: g.yas phyogs rdzas stegs pad dkar 'dab brgyad kyi lte
NK016(ma)015:23: bar ba las byung ba'i mar khu dgang blugs kyi
NK016(ma)015:24: gzar bu kha sbyar ba dang bcas pa /
NK016(ma)015:25: mdun gyi 'dab mar 'o ma can gyi rtse mo'i
NK016(ma)015:26: cha las byung ba'i yam shing mtho gang ba rtse
NK016(ma)015:28: pad 'dab lhag ma bdun la til dkar /
NK016(ma)015:31: nas dkar dang 'bras dkar gyi chan sogs kha zas dkar po'i rigs /
NK016(ma)015:32: tsam pa ka sogs me tog dkar po'i rigs /
NK016(ma)015:33: thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs kar rnams rin po che'i dkar po'i snod du bsham /
NK016(ma)015:34: g.yon phyogs mchod stegs pad dkar 'dab brgyad lte bar /
NK016(ma)015:35: 'o ma 'bras chan dngul phye me tog dkar po
NK016(ma)015:36: rnams dang bsres pa'i mar dkar gyi gtor ma zlum
NK016(ma)015:37: po ril bu drug gis bskor ba /
NK016(ma)015:38: bdun gyi pad 'dab la rdo dril /
NK016(ma)015:39: de'i g.yas g.yon gyi 'dab mar sman raka /
NK016(ma)015:40: pad 'dab lhag ma lnga la zhabs bsil bdug spos
NK016(ma)015:41: me tog mar me dri chab bcas g.yas bskor du
NK016(ma)015:42: bsham / rang gi mdun du bsang chu dang me tog gi snod sogs 'du byas la /
NK016(ma)015:43: chas gos dkar po bgos te gtsang ma'i stan la
NK016(ma)015:44: kha shar du phyogs pas skyil krung gis zhi zhing
NK016(ma)015:45: dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khod de las rim la 'jug
NK016(ma)015:46: go // gnyis pa dngos gzhi ni /
NK016(ma)015:47: bdag gi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas /
NK016(ma)015:48: bsang chu'i nang du nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'u
NK016(ma)015:49: yig dmar po'i 'phro 'dus khro mo dbang phyug ma
NK016(ma)015:50: dmar mo dril bu dang b+han dmar 'dzin pa gsal
NK016(ma)015:51: la / ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa ri sarba dra
NK016(ma)015:52: b+y+aam shwa d+ha ya +aahmh'u h+r+aihtha zhes nyer gcig bzlas
NK016(ma)015:54: khro mo dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin chu'i rdul phra rab tu gyur par bsam /
NK016(ma)015:55: ma h+aa badz+ra h+au gis rdo rje gsor zhing snying gar bzung /
NK016(ma)015:56: badz+ra gan+de +aahs dril bu gsil zhing dkur brten /
NK016(ma)015:57: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa
NK016(ma)015:58: ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham gis
NK016(ma)015:59: rdo dril bsnol ba'i 'khyud rgya dang bcas dam tshig
NK016(ma)015:60: gsum bzung / phyi mchod rnams kro d+hi shwa r+ais bsang /
NK016(ma)015:62: stong pa'i ngang las mchod snod dbyings kyi zhing khams
NK016(ma)015:63: bsam gyis mi khyab par 'khor 'das kyi rtsi bcud
NK016(ma)015:64: thams cad bsdus nas mchod rdzas la thim par gyur
NK016(ma)015:65: // na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha n+aam ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK016(ma)015:66: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+hu /
NK016(ma)015:67: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga push+pe pu /
NK016(ma)015:68: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga +aa lo ge h+r+aih sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga gan+d+he gan /
NK016(ma)015:69: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihtha /
NK016(ma)015:72: gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams bsang sbyang /
NK016(ma)015:73: stong pa'i ngang las ma dang nyi zla'i ga'u'i snod
NK016(ma)015:74: du rang gi thugs ka nas gtor ma'i gnas su
NK016(ma)015:75: 'bru gsum dang sreg rdzas kyi gnas su 'bru lnga
NK016(ma)015:76: spros te 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las zhi
NK016(ma)015:77: ba'i las gtor rin po che'i mchod sdong 'od zer
NK016(ma)015:79: sreg rdzas rnams ro brgya ldan pa'i zag med ye
NK016(ma)015:80: shes kyi bdud rtsi nam mkha' gang bas zhi ba'i
NK016(ma)015:81: las sgrub pa la thogs pa med pa'i nus pa
NK016(ma)015:82: dang ldan par gyur par bsam la /
NK016(ma)015:85: zhes bzlas pas byin gyis brlab /
NK016(ma)015:87: stong pa'i ngang las mdun du h'u las zhi ba'i
NK016(ma)015:88: thab khung dkar zhing zlum pa mtshan nyid yongs su
NK016(ma)015:89: rdzogs pa 'od zer dkar po 'phro bar gyur /
NK016(ma)015:90: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig thab nang du
NK016(ma)015:91: spros pa ye shes kyi me 'od dkar po 'bar
NK016(ma)015:92: bar bsam zhing / ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h'u phata /
NK016(ma)015:93: ces rgyun bzhag gam gtsub shing las byung ba'i me du ba med pa sbar la /
NK016(ma)015:94: thab kyi me'i nang du ye shes rin po che
NK016(ma)015:95: 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
NK016(ma)015:97: seng ge brgyad kyis btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri
NK016(ma)015:98: pad nyi zla ba'i gdan la bdag gi thugs ka
NK016(ma)015:99: nas a dkar po spros pa zla ba'i gdan gyi
NK016(ma)015:100: steng du babs / de yongs su gyur pa las h'u yig sngon po gsal zhing 'bar ba /
NK016(ma)015:102: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs /
NK016(ma)015:103: slar 'dus yongs su gyur pa las me lha bcom
NK016(ma)015:104: ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpal sku mdog mthing
NK016(ma)015:105: ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK016(ma)015:106: zhi zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i mdangs gsal ba'i zhal
NK016(ma)015:107: gyi 'gyur ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rol
NK016(ma)015:108: pa'i nyams can / mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar ba /
NK016(ma)015:109: phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin cing /
NK016(ma)015:110: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pas yum la 'khyud pa /
NK016(ma)015:111: dbu skra ral pa'i thor tshugs can /
NK016(ma)015:112: zhabs gnyis rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)015:113: yab kyi thugs ka nas m+au chad /
NK016(ma)015:114: 'od zer 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK016(ma)015:115: yab kyi g.yon phyogs nye ba'i pang du yum rdo
NK016(ma)015:116: rje dbyings phyug ma sngon mo g.yas dril bu 'dzin
NK016(ma)015:118: g.yon rdo rje rang gi thugs kar 'dzin pa /
NK016(ma)015:119: brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung gis 'khril ba /
NK016(ma)015:120: gnyis ka'ang zhi ba'i rgyan chas bcu gsum gyis spras shing /
NK016(ma)015:121: zhi ba'i nyams dgu rgyas pa /
NK016(ma)015:122: 'od zer kha dog drug gi snang ba re re'ang
NK016(ma)015:123: bye ba phrag drug drug tu 'phro ba'i klong na
NK016(ma)015:124: bzhugs pa / yab yum gnyis kyi thugs kar rang
NK016(ma)015:125: 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' rgyan dang phyag mtshan spangs
NK016(ma)015:126: pa re re'i thugs kar zla ba la h+au dang
NK016(ma)015:127: m+au yig sngon po rtag tu 'char bzhin pa /
NK016(ma)015:128: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis dbang gi lha
NK016(ma)015:129: mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i rigs lnga yab
NK016(ma)015:130: yum gyi rnam par spyan drangs /
NK016(ma)015:131: rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad /
NK016(ma)015:132: rjes chags kyi mes zhu ba'i ye shes lnga'i chu
NK016(ma)015:133: rgyun spyi bo'i gnas lngar babs te dbang bskur bas
NK016(ma)015:136: phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su gnas gyur /
NK016(ma)015:137: chu'i lhag ma spyi bor brtan pa las mi bskyod
NK016(ma)015:138: pa bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lnga sprul sku'i cha
NK016(ma)015:140: slar yang spyi bor zla ba la mo dkar po /
NK016(ma)015:141: mgrin par pad+ma la +aam dmar po /
NK016(ma)015:142: snying gar nyi ma la h+au sngon po /
NK016(ma)015:143: de gsum las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje
NK016(ma)015:144: gsum gyi lha tshogs nam mkha' gang bar spyan drangs
NK016(ma)015:145: te yi ge so so la thim pas de bzhin
NK016(ma)015:146: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum dang gnyis
NK016(ma)015:148: yi ge so so yongs su gyur pa las /
NK016(ma)015:149: spyi bor sku rdo rje dkar po 'khor lo /
NK016(ma)015:150: mgrin par gsung rdo rje dmar po pad+ma /
NK016(ma)015:151: snying gar thugs rdo rje sngon po rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis rgyas btab par gyur /
NK016(ma)015:152: slar yang snying ga'i h+au gi 'od zer gyis phyogs
NK016(ma)015:153: bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskur
NK016(ma)015:154: bas / chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las
NK016(ma)015:155: gzugs sku rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi rnam
NK016(ma)015:158: dzahmh'u bam hoh ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig pa dang dbyer med par gyur /
NK016(ma)015:159: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu
NK016(ma)015:160: khe b+h+yahsarba tat+kham ut+ga te s+pha ra na hi mam
NK016(ma)015:161: ga ga na kham swa h+aa /
NK016(ma)015:162: a ha ra a ha ra sarba bid+y+aa d+ha ra
NK016(ma)015:163: p+au dzi te na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha nam ga ga
NK016(ma)015:164: na kham sa ma ye swa h+aa /
NK016(ma)015:165: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+hu pe d+hu /
NK016(ma)015:166: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga push+pe pu /
NK016(ma)015:167: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga +aa lo ke h+r+aih sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga gan+d+he gan /
NK016(ma)015:168: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK016(ma)015:169: ma h+aa rak+ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK016(ma)015:170: ma h+aa ba ling+ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK016(ma)015:172: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK016(ma)015:173: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
NK016(ma)015:174: rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang //
NK016(ma)015:177: dkyil 'khor gyi lha cung zad 'dzum pa'i ljags rdo
NK016(ma)015:178: rje 'od kyi sbu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi
NK016(ma)015:179: bdud rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsam la /
NK016(ma)015:180: badz+ra sat+wa +aah zhes pa bdun gyis gzar bu'i mar khus dgang gzar bkang yig brgya'i mthar /
NK016(ma)015:181: bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i nad gdon
NK016(ma)015:182: sdig sgrib dam tshig nyams chag thams cad zhi ba'i
NK016(ma)015:184: zhes spel tshig dang bcas pas lan gsum 'bul /
NK016(ma)015:185: de nas yam shing mar khu sogs sreg rdzas gzhan rnams yig brgya la /
NK016(ma)015:186: shin+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa btags pas grangs bsags shing spel tshig sngar ltar las /
NK016(ma)015:187: thams cad sh+ain+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa zhes sbyar nas 'bul /
NK016(ma)015:189: badz+ra sat+wa ah i dam ba ling+ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK016(ma)015:191: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK016(ma)015:194: thab tu yungs dkar 'thor zhing sngar dgang blugs skabs bzhin 'dod don gsol /
NK016(ma)015:195: de ltar sreg rdzas bdud rtsi'i dwangs ma dgyes pa
NK016(ma)015:196: chen pos bzhes te mnyes shing tshims nas 'bar ba'i
NK016(ma)015:197: 'od zer dkar po zla ba'i rtsi lta bu mkha'
NK016(ma)015:198: khyab tu spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas bdag
NK016(ma)015:199: gzhan gyi nyams chag sdig sgrib nad gdon bar chad
NK016(ma)015:200: thams cad lhag med du sangs kyis bsal bar mos
NK016(ma)015:201: / slar yang gong bzhin dgang blugs lan gsum du phul zhing gtang rag gi mchod bstod bya /
NK016(ma)015:202: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshang dang //
NK016(ma)015:203: gang yang nus pa ma mchis pas //
NK016(ma)015:204: 'di ni bgyi ba gang nongs pa //
NK016(ma)015:205: de kun khyed kyis bzod mdzad rigs //
NK016(ma)015:206: zhes dang yig brgyas nongs pa bshags //
NK016(ma)015:207: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
NK016(ma)015:208: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
NK016(ma)015:209: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
NK016(ma)015:210: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
NK016(ma)015:211: badz+ra muhs ye shes pa rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs /
NK016(ma)015:212: dam tshig pa bdag nyid la thim par bsam mo //
NK016(ma)015:214: me rang zhir btang ba'am 'o ma dang dri bzang
NK016(ma)015:215: gi chus gzhil la thal sol rnams chu klung du
NK016(ma)015:216: sbyang / dge ba bsngo zhing shis pa brjod pas mtha' brgyan pa'o //
NK016(ma)015:217: zhes pa'ang rgya'i sngags ston bsod nams chos kyi rgyal
NK016(ma)015:218: mtshan gyi bzhed pa bzhin 'jigs bral ye shes rdo
NK016(ma)015:219: rjes gzhung don snying por dril te sbyar ba dge
